# redpanda_schema (Data Source)

Schema resource



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `subject` (String) Schema Subject

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Id of Schema
- `schema` (String) Schema - string encoded
- `schema_type` (String) Schema Type, defaults to AVRO
